main_definition: A device used to capture images, either still or moving, by recording light or other electromagnetic radiation.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To observe or notice something carefully
meanings_and_examples.example: She cameras the details of the crime scene.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A place for observing, like an observatory
meanings_and_examples.example: The astronomy club met at their local camera to study stars and planets.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To record or document events or activities
meanings_and_examples.example: They decided to cameras the wedding ceremony on video.
